title: That Kid In The Game!
alternative_title: 게임 속 그 애! ; Geim sok geu ae!
status: 게임 속 그 애! ; Geim sok geu ae!
description:
Description :
        One day, a friend who used to enjoy playing games together contacts you to meet in person?!  Jo A-Yeong, who neither wants to meet people nor work, simply loves playing games. Do Gyeon-ho, making an inscrutable facial expression, appears mysteriously somewhere. Although we met in a game, can the two of us really spend time together like ordinary friends?
